INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: With the metoprolol used in heart failure: risk of increase of the undesirable effects of metoprolol due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism by the hydroxycloroquine
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring. If needed, adjustment of the dosage of the metoprolol during the treatment with the hydroxychloroquine

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the therapeutic effect of the hydroxychloroquine, due to increase of its metabolism by the rifampicin
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring and possible adjustment of the dosage of the hydroxychloroquine during the treatment with rifampicin and after it is stopped.

CLASS.name: SUBSTANCES THAT TEND TO INDUCE TORSADES DE POINTES

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increased risk of ventricular arrhythmias, especially of torsades de pointes
INTERACTION.COMMENT: --with the citalopram, the domperidone, the escitalopram, the hydroxyzine and the piperaquine
